import React, { useState } from 'react' import { FaBars, FaTimes } from 'react-icons/fa' import logo from './images/logo.png' import './Navbar.css' const Navbar = () => { //mobile nav const [click, setClick] = useState(false) const handleClick = () => setClick(!click) //change nav color when scroll const[color,setcolor]=useState //close menu on click const closeMenu = () => setClick(false) return (
{click ? () : ()}

) } export default Navbar
